summary: WINDSHIELD WIPERS ARE ACTIVATED BY USING THE TURN SIGNALS OR CHANGING THE LIGHT BEAMS FROM LOW TO HIGH OR VICE VERSA AT LEAST ONCE EACH TIME THE CAR IS DRIVEN. DROVE 64 MILES TODAY AND IT HAPPENED THREE TIMES. VERY FRUSTRATING. THE SCRATCHES IN THE WINDSHIELD ARE BEGINNING TO MAKE NIGHT DRIVING MORE DIFFICULT AND UNSAFE. *TS     *JB  ****DIMSII IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12-12-02 CUT OVER TO ARTEMIS****
